name: Pehr Brändström Award Medal
obverse: Bust of Pehr Brändström facing right.
reverse_inscriptions: PER BRÄNDSTRÖM COMM. RÅD. R. V. O. STIFTARE AF GEFLE ELEMENTAR SKOLA BEREDDE GENOM FRIKOSTIGA GÅFVOR UPPMUNTRAN ÅT IDOGHETEN TILLFLYGT ÅT NÖDEN
description: Peter Brändström was a Swedish businessman born October 6, 1735 and died August 22, 1809 in Gävle, Sweden.
Brändström was in the trading business and became one of richest men in Gävle.
He made a donation to found Borgarskolan, an elementary school, which opened on January 16, 1797.
This medal was made to be rewarded to graduates of the elementary school.
